translated: Since I went forth,🔽twenty-five years have passed.
Not having attained serenity of mind,
not being in control of my mind,

analyzed: saritvā jina sāsana  bahūhi dukkha dhammehi
translated: remembering the Teacher’s instruction.🔽Because of my delight in heedfulness,
I’ve seen many things that are painful.
The ending of craving has been reached.
The Buddha’s instruction has been done.
